alert.note: Alert for Pine; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 4:39PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Aitkin, Pine, southwestern Bayfield, southern Douglas, northern Washburn, Burnett and northwestern Sawyer Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 438 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gordon, to near Sandstone, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mille Lacs Band Lena Lake Area around 455 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Cable, Seeley, Duxbury, Danbury, Webster, Namekagon, Namekagon Lake and Webb Lake Wisconsin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
